article_title: Canada's Ontario shuts down most public venues, declares state of emergency
article_description: Ontario  Canada s most populous province  banned gatherings of more than 50 people and ordered the closure of bars and restaurants on Tuesday in a bid to slow the spread of the coronavirus
article_content: TORONTO  Reuters    Ontario  Canada s most populous province  banned gatherings of more than 50 people and ordered the closure of bars and restaurants on Tuesday in a bid to slow the spread of the coronavirus   We must act decisively  we must not delay  Pr   221 chars
